|brand = MYIR |model = MYS-7Z010-L-C |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = V1.1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Xilink;Zynq XC7010;XCZ7010-1CLG400ABX2041; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 667<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128JVEQ; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Micron;MTFC4GACAJCN-1M WT; |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Microchip;KSZ9031RN; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0A:35
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.10;; |stockos = Linux;3.15.0-xilinx;Buildroot 2015.02;
|exp_if_types = MicroSD Card slot, USB 2.0 (OTG) |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, J24 |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = FPGA, |addchip = USB 2.0 ULPI Transceiver;SMSC;USB3320;;1;,,, 3A, 1.2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;MPS;MP2143;;5;,,, 500mA Bypass Capacitor CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9013;;1;,,, System Supervisory Voltage Reset w/ Watchdog;ON Semi;CAT823;;1;,,, SDIO Port Expander w/ Voltage Level Translation;TI;TXS02612;;1;,,, Current-Limited, Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2051;;1;,,, 2-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXS0102;;1;,,, Sink/Source DDR Termination Regulator;TI;TPS51200;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver;TI;SN74LVC2G07;;4; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- none --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2017 |estprice = 75 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specification=== *CPU: Xilink Z-7010 Dual-core (ARM Cortex-A9) @667MHz :Artix-7 FPGA fabric w/ 28K logic cells, 17600 LUTs, 80 DSP slices *Storage: 16MB (QSPI) Flash, 4GB eMMC, Micro SD (TF) slot *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) RAM *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) port *Power: 5V/2A
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/07/20/myir-introduces-z-turn-lite-board-powered-by-xilinx-zynq-7007szynq-7010-soc-for-69-and-up/ ''MYiR Introduces Z-Turn Lite Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/compact-low-cost-sbc-runs-linux-on-zynq-7007s-armfpga-soc/ ''Low cost Cortex-A9 SBC offers GbE'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/07/20/myir-introduces-z-turn-lite-board-powered-by-xilinx-zynq-7007szynq-7010-soc-for-69-and-up/ ''MYiR Introduces Z-Turn Lite Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/compact-low-cost-sbc-runs-linux-on-zynq-7007s-armfpga-soc/ ''Low cost Cortex-A9 SBC offers GbE'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
